markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Winder's Ring](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1596)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 79</row>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This ring contains dozens of minute, interlocking bronze gears that buzz incessantly. The ring grants you a +1 item bonus to all [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) checks to construct or repair clockworks.

<document level="2" id="action-1209" />

<document level="2" id="action-1210" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Winder's Ring
